column2: Rapid, heavy respiration, slow reflexes. Tumor spanned between shoulders
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
Tumor spanned from shoulder to shoulder.
1 tumor chunk was frozen for cryogenics.
Heart and lungs looked like it had a met upon visual inspection. Also, the heart looked slightly enlarged.
